location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of stores sent on board Lovely Tish, and informing that the Governor approves of Bruce's order to return the vessel to Bombay.
